question: Which among the following regions receive Frontal precipitation?
option1: The mid-latitude regions experiencing the convergence of warm tropical and cold polar air masses
option3: Along the mountain side in the western coast and northeast parts of India
option4: In the interiors of the continents during the summer season when the temperature of these regions rises quickly
answer: The mid-latitude regions experiencing the convergence of warm tropical and cold polar air masses
explanation: Frontal precipitation occurs when a front or boundary line is formed between two air masses of contrasting temperature. Along the fronts, the warm air rises above the denser cold air. The mid-latitude regions experiencing the convergence of warm tropical and cold polar air masses are important areas receiving frontal precipitation.
